nodes.name: Open Excel
nodes.description: Opens an Excel file (.xlsx, .xlsm, .xls) for manipulation. Supports password-protected files through the credential system.

inPath.title: Excel File Path
inPath.description: The path to the Excel file to open. Supports .xlsx, .xlsm, .xls, .xlam, .xltm, and .xltx formats. If the file doesn't exist and 'Create If Not Exists' is enabled, a new file will be created.

optCreate.title: Create If Not Exists
optCreate.description: If true, creates a new Excel file if the specified path doesn't exist. If false, returns an error when the file is not found.

optCredentials.title: Password
optCredentials.subtitle: Password
optCredentials.description: Credentials for password-protected Excel files. Select a vault item containing the file password to open encrypted files.

nodes.name: Close Excel
nodes.description: Closes an opened Excel file and releases its file handle from memory. This should be called when you're done working with a file.

nodes.name: Create Excel
nodes.description: Creates a new Excel file at the specified path. Can optionally overwrite existing files if the Overwrite option is enabled.

optOverwrite.title: Overwrite If Exists
optOverwrite.description: If true, overwrites an existing file at the specified path. If false, returns an error when a file already exists at the target location.

nodes.name: Save Excel
nodes.description: Saves an Excel file to disk. Can save to the original path or to a new location specified by the Save File Path parameter.

inSaveFilePath.title: Save File Path
inSaveFilePath.description: Optional path to save the file to a different location. If empty, saves to the original file path.

nodes.name: Switch To Sheet
nodes.description: Switches the active worksheet in an Excel file to the specified sheet name. The active sheet determines which sheet other operations will target.

inFileDescriptor.title: Excel File Descriptor
inFileDescriptor.description: The Excel file handle returned from Open Excel or Create Excel node.

inSheet.title: Sheet
inSheet.description: The name of the worksheet to switch to. This sheet must exist in the Excel file.

nodes.name: Create Sheet
nodes.description: Creates a new worksheet in an Excel file with the specified name. Optionally switches to the new sheet after creation.

nodes.name: Copy Sheet
nodes.description: Creates a copy of an existing worksheet within the same Excel file. The copied sheet includes all data, formatting, and formulas from the source sheet.

nodes.name: Set Style
nodes.description: Applies formatting styles to a range of cells in the active worksheet. Supports font family, size, formatting options like bold/italic/underline, and custom number formats.

nodes.name: Set Active Cell
nodes.description: Sets the active cell position in the worksheet. Can move to a specific cell or navigate relative to the current position (up, down, next, previous, etc.).

nodes.name: Set Cell Value
nodes.description: Sets the value of a specific cell in the active worksheet. Supports different data formats including text, numbers, dates, and boolean values.

nodes.name: Get Cell Value
nodes.description: Retrieves the value from a specific cell in the active worksheet. Can return formatted or raw cell values, and supports formula evaluation.

optRawValue.title: Raw Value
optRawValue.description: Enable this option if you wish to retrieve the unformatted raw cell value. For example, it will return the float value 1234.50 instead of the formatted string '$1,234.50'. For date cells, it will return the raw numeric value 45167 (the number of days passed since 01-01-1900) instead of the Date Time formatted '2023-08-30' string value.

nodes.name: Set Formula
nodes.description: Sets an Excel formula in a specific cell. Supports all Excel formula syntax including functions, cell references, and mathematical operations.

nodes.name: Delete Cell
nodes.description: Clears the content of a specific cell in the active worksheet. Can target the active cell or a specific cell reference.

nodes.name: Insert Column
nodes.description: Inserts a new column with data into the worksheet. Can insert at the active column position or at a specific column location.

nodes.name: Insert Row
nodes.description: Inserts a new row with data into the worksheet. Can insert at the active row position or at a specific row number.

nodes.name: Delete Row
nodes.description: Deletes an entire row from the worksheet. Can delete the active row or a specific row by number.

nodes.name: Get Range
nodes.description: Retrieves data from a specified cell range in the active worksheet. Can return data in table format with optional headers and JSON conversion.

optRawValue.title: Raw Value
optRawValue.description: Enable this option if you wish to sort columns by their raw cell values. When selected, 'Get Range' will return unformatted values. For example, it will return the float value 1234.50 instead of the formatted string '$1,234.50', or the raw numeric value 45167 (the number of days passed since 01-01-1900) instead of the Date Time formatted '2023-08-30' string value.

nodes.name: Delete Column
nodes.description: Deletes an entire column from the worksheet. Can delete the active column or a specific column by name/letter.

nodes.name: Get Row
nodes.description: Retrieves data from a specific row in the worksheet. Supports navigation options like first row, next row, previous row, or specific row number.

nodes.name: Get Column
nodes.description: Retrieves all data from a specific column in the worksheet. Returns the column values as an array.

nodes.name: Set Range
nodes.description: Writes table data to a specified cell range in the worksheet. Can start from the active cell or a specific starting cell position.

nodes.name: Excel to CSV
nodes.description: Converts an Excel file to CSV format. Each worksheet is converted to a separate CSV file with configurable field separators.

nodes.name: Get Sheets
nodes.description: Retrieves a list of all worksheet names in the Excel file. Optionally includes metadata information about each sheet.

nodes.name: Append Excel
nodes.description: Appends data from one Excel worksheet to another Excel worksheet. Combines data from two different sheets or files.

nodes.name: Merge Excel
nodes.description: Merges data from two Excel worksheets into a single dataset. Combines data from two different sheets or files side by side.

nodes.name: Find and Replace
nodes.description: Searches for specific text or values in the worksheet and replaces them with new content. Supports regex patterns and different data formats.

nodes.name: Search Sheet
nodes.description: Searches for specific text or patterns in the worksheet and returns the cell locations where matches are found. Supports regex pattern matching.

nodes.name: Clear Range
nodes.description: Clears content from a specified cell range in the worksheet. Removes all data while preserving cell formatting.

nodes.name: Create Pivot Table
nodes.description: Creates a pivot table from source data to summarize and analyze information. Supports rows, columns, filters, and data aggregation options.

nodes.name: Get Formula
nodes.description: Retrieves the formula from a specific cell in the worksheet. Returns the actual formula text rather than the calculated result.
